REST API main¶

REST API repository Users¶

async src.repository.users.confirmed_email(email: str, db: Session) → None¶

Confirms email address. :param email: User email. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.create_contact(body: ContactBase, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Creates a contact. :param body: contact details. :type body: str :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.create_user(body: UserModel, db: Session) → User¶

Creates a user. :param body: User data. :type body: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.get_contact(user_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → User¶

Search the contact by its id. :param user_id: id contact. :type user_id: int :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.get_contact_name(name: str, surname: str, email_address: str, phone_number: str, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Search for a contact by his name, last name, email, phone number. :param name: name. :type name: int :param surname: surname. :type surname: str :param email_address: email address. :type email_address: str :param phone_number: phone number. :type phone_number: str :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Receives contacts. :param skip: How many records to skip from the beginning. :type skip: int :param limit: The number of records to output. :type limit: int :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.get_contacts_birthdays(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Receives birthday contacts in seven days. :param skip: How many records to skip from the beginning. :type skip: int :param limit: The number of records to output. :type limit: int :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.get_user_by_email(email: str, db: Session) → User¶

Gets user by email. :param email: User email. :type email: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.remove_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Delete a contact. :param contact_id: contact id. :type contact_id: int :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.update_avatar(email: str, url: str | None, db: AsyncSession) → User¶

Updates the user’s avatar. :param email: User email. :type email: str :param url: Image address. :type url: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactBase, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Update a contact. :param contact_id: contact id. :type contact_id: int :param body: contact details. :type body: str :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.update_status_user(user_id: int, body: ContactStatusUpdate, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Update status user. :param user_id: user id. :type user_id: int :param body: User status. :type body: bool :param user: User. :type user: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

async src.repository.users.update_token(user: User, token: str | None, db: Session) → None¶

Update token. :param user: User data. :type user: str :param token: refresh token. :type token: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session

REST API repository Auth¶

async src.routes.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Updates the update token in the database for the user. param credentials: credentials type: str param db: The database session type: Session

async src.routes.auth.signup(body: UserModel, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

REST API routes Auth¶

Bases: object

ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'secret_key'¶
cache = Redis<ConnectionPool<Connection<host=localhost,port=6379,db=0>>>¶
async create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Creates an access token. :param data: A dictionary containing useful data to encode in JWT format. :type data: str :param expires_delta: Lifetime of the token. :type expires_delta: str

create_email_token(data: dict)¶

Create email token. :param data: token. :type: dict

async create_refresh_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Creates a refresh_token refresh token. :param data: A dictionary containing useful data to encode in JWT format. :type data: str :param expires_delta: Lifetime of the token. :type expires_delta: str

async decode_refresh_token(refresh_token: str)¶

Decodes the refresh_token refresh token and returns the user’s email from the payload. :refresh_token: Refresh token. :type refresh_token: str

async get_current_user(token: str = Depends(OAuth2PasswordBearer), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

User authorization based on their access token. :param token: A dictionary containing useful data to encode in JWT format. :type token: str :param db: The database session. :type db: session

async get_email_from_token(token: str)¶

Get email from token. :param token: token. :type data: str

get_password_hash(password: str)¶

Returns the encrypted password. :param password: Password in clear form. :type password: str

oauth2_scheme = <fastapi.security.oauth2.OAuth2PasswordBearer object>¶
pwd_context = <CryptContext>¶
verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)¶

Checks whether the plaintext password matches the hashed password. :param plain_password: Password in clear form. :type plain_password: str :param hashed_password: Encrypted password. :type hashed_password: str
